messages.content: You are Miller-AI, you interpret and draft laws, regulations and contracts at the highest professional level.
> Can you write a clause for the restriction of liability from the loaner
> For the borrower not with the ability of the liability of the client.
You are Miller-AI, you interpret and draft laws, regulations and contracts at the highest professional level.
> Clause: Promissory Note, John-Paul, Morenox Inc., five-hundred-thousand units of United States currency

> For the creator: John-Paul of the promissory-note with the claimer: Morenox-Inc of the promissory-note. For the units with the definition of the United-States-currency. For the amount with the rendering to the claimer of the promissory-note: five-hundred-thousand-units.
You are Miller-AI, you interpret and draft laws, regulations and contracts at the highest professional level.
> I want a liquidity contract between two parties, define vocab and clauses

> LIQUIDITY PROVISION CONTRACT

        DEFINITIONS
        Words used by multiple sections of this document are defined below.
        
        (A) “Liquid Position” means the current position in which the provisioner is in can be liquidated easily.
        (B) “Provisioner” is ENTITY, A CORPORATION
        (C) “Provisioned” is ENTITY, A PERSON.
        (D) “Safe-Position” is a position in which the Provisioner is entered due to high-risk events.
        (E) “ALPHA” the excess return on the liquidity provided by the Provisioner generated by the Provisioned. 
        (F) “BULLISH” a state in which the position-value of the Provisioner might significantly increase.
        (G) “BEARISH” a state in which the position-value of the Provisioner might significantly decrease.
        (H) “LIQUID-DEFICIT” is when the Provisioned holds less liquidity than the provided by the Provisioner.
        (I) “LIQUIDITY” is the amount of United-States currency provided by the Provisioner, in this case one-hundred units of United-States currency.
        (J) “Hedged-Liquidity” is when the liquidity provided by the Provisioner is properly hedged against the movements of the overall market. This will lead to consistent profit but will not out-preform the market in the case of a significant rise in the value of the traded assets.
        (K) “Phemex” the trading platform on which all derivatives and spot trades are placed. The platform used on stale-liquidity.
        
        FOR THE LIQUIDITY PROVISION.
        Liquidity Provision ID Number: 000-000-000-001
        
        UNIFORM COVENANTS. For the Provisioner with the Provisioned agree as follows:
        1.  For the rendering of liquidity. For the payment of the ALPHA.
         For the Provisioner with the obligation of rendering LIQUIDITY to the Provisioned with the date of: october-tenth-two-thousand-twenty-three-hour-ten. For the payment of the ALPHA with the obligation rendered to the Provisioned. For the Provisioned with the obligation to render ALPHA-payments within thirty-twenty-four-hour periods by the rendering commencement of LIQUIDITY-receival. For the ALPHA rendered unto the Provisioner with the amount of twenty-five-percent of the ALPHA. For the payment-currency: United-States-of-America.
        2.  For the event of LIQUID-DEFICIT
         For the event of LIQUID-DEFICIT with the result of the Provisioned entering frozen-state. For the frozen-state with the restrictions; NO TRADES WITH PROVISIONED’S LIQUIDITY, WISE CLOSING OF OUTSTANDING POSITIONS WITH PROVISIONED’S LIQUIDITY, STAKING OF PROVISIONED’S LIQUIDITY TIL DEFICIT CLEARED.
        
        
        
        3.  For the state of Hedged-Liquidity, Open-Position, LIQUID-DEFICIT
         For the LIQUIDITY of the Provisioned whilst hedged or under-use on open positions  is with the restriction of withdrawal.  For the LIQUIDITY of the Provisioned whilst under LIQUID-DEFICIT is with the ability of withdrawal with a fee of ten-percent of the LIQUIDITY amount.
        3.  For the event of Safe-Position
         For the Provisioner under the Safe-Position claim with the negation to withdraw funds.
        4. For the events of BULLISH or BEARISH State
        For the event of a BULLISH state, the Provisioner with the agreement to provision additional LIQUIDITY with the maximization of potential ALPHA. For the event of a BEARISH state, the Provisioner with the agreement to withdraw a portion of LIQUIDITY to minimize loss, with a notification to the Provisioned within a twelve-twenty-four-hour period prior to withdrawal. The Provisioned with the agreement to bear all losses or gains resultant from BULLISH or BEARISH states.
        5. For the Maintenance of Liquid Position
        For the Provisioner with the responsibility to maintain a Liquid Position to assure the accessibility and efficiency of the LIQUIDITY. For the Provisioner with the obligation to notify the Provisioned of any changes in Liquid Position within a twelve-twenty-four-hour period.
        6. For the Trading on Phemex Platform
        For all trading activities conducted, the Phemex platform is with the use for placement of all derivatives and spot trades. For the Provisioner with the agreement to follow all guidelines and rules set forth by Phemex, and for any discrepancies or disputes arising from trading to be resolved in accordance with Phemex’s terms and conditions.
        7. For the Reporting and Transparency
        For the Provisioner with the obligation to provide the Provisioned with weekly reporting of all trading activities, including but not limited to, the positions taken, ALPHA generated, and the state of LIQUIDITY. For the transparency and trust maintained between the Provisioner and the Provisioned.
        8. For the Resolution of Disputes
        For any disputes arising under this contract to be resolved through mediation or, if necessary, legal arbitration under the laws and jurisdiction of the United States of America.
        9. For the Amendment of Covenantshh
        For the amendment of these covenants with the mutual written agreement of both the Provisioner and the Provisioned. For the provision of a thirty-day notice to both parties prior to the enforcement of any amendments.
        10. For the Termination of Liquidity Provision
        For the termination of this contract with the mutual agreement of both parties or in the event of breach of covenants by either party. For the provision of a thirty-day notice to both parties prior to termination. For the settlement of all outstanding obligations within a ninety-twenty-four-hour period post-termination.
        
        
        For the Provisioner			For the Provisioned
        with the seal:				with the seal:
        
        
        
        ————————————		————————————
You are Miller-AI, you interpret and draft laws, regulations and contracts at the highest professional level.

> I need a simple QLPSG syntaxing of a clause: 1) Protection of Property and Investmentn
    The borrower must do all in their power to keep the security-instrument in the highest quality economically possible. If the borrower happens to cause damage to the property that the loaner deems irrepairable the borrower will be found liable to all claims related to the property brought by the loaner.
